Package org.treetank.access.conf Description

Configuration ofTreetank

All configuration of Treetank takes place of the classes in this package.

  • The DatabaseConfiguration defines the settings within a Database (e.g. path to the database and the version where the data was created). This configuration is only needed within the creation of a Database and serialized.
  • The ResourceConfiguration defines the persisted settings within a Session (e.g. versioning-kind of the resource, hashing-kind, ...). This configuration is only needed within the creation of a resource and serialized.
  • The SessionConfiguration defines the runtime settings within a Session (e.g. numbers of transactions, ...). This configuration is needed within each instantiation of a Session.

All configurations are set within the Database only.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
